DLG ITM_0

DLG SPR_0
Zzzzz seat zzz please...

DLG ITM_0
You got a cup of tea! Nice.

DLG SPR_1
Don't worry, You will leave soon, 15 minutes max! Please take a seat.

DLG SPR_2
We are a bit late but everything will be fix in 20 minutes. Please take a seat.

DLG SPR_3
You will be at home before midnight. For sure! Please, take a seat.

DLG SPR_4
The train should be here in 5 minutes, please take a seat.

DLG SPR_5
Zzzzzz

END 0


END undefined
After a very quite ride, you're finally home. It wasn't that long, right?
